library.name: Overview
library.description: The default overview for ticket records

extension_params.data_query:
type:worklist.records
of:ticket
query:(
  id:{{record_id}}
  limit:1
  sort:[id]
)
format:dictionaries
extension_params.sheet_kata:
layout:
  style: fieldsets
  headings@bool: no
  paging@bool: no
  title_column: image
  colors:
    labels@csv: #898989, #646464
    labels_dark@csv: #898989, #cccccc
    statuses@csv: #66aa57, #5585cc, #636363, #d3352a

columns:
  icon/image:
    params:
      record_uri@raw: cerb:group:{{group_id}}
      text_size@raw: 400%
  
  card/group__label:
    params:
      bold@bool: yes
      underline@bool: no
      text_size: 135%
      text_color@raw: labels:0
  
  card/bucket__label:
    params:
      bold@bool: yes
      underline@bool: no
      text_color@raw: labels:1
      text_size: 200%
  
  text/status:
    params:
      bold@bool: yes
      text_size: 145%
      value_template@raw:
        {{status|capitalize}}
        {% if reopen_date and status in ['waiting','closed'] %}
        (<abbr title="{{reopen_date|date('r')}}">{{reopen_date|date_pretty}}</abbr>)
        {% endif %}        
      text_color@raw: statuses:{{status_id}}
  
  toolbar/actions:
    label: Actions
    params:
      kata:
        interaction/reopen:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.status
          hidden@raw,bool: {{not cerb_record_writeable('ticket', id) or 'open' == status}}
          label: Re-open
          icon: upload
          inputs:
            ticket@raw: {{id}}
            #confirm@bool: yes
            status: open
        interaction/move:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.move
          hidden@raw,bool: {{not cerb_record_writeable('ticket', id)}}
          label: Move
          icon: send
          keyboard: M
          inputs:
            ticket@raw: {{id}}
        interaction/close:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.status
          hidden@raw,bool:
            {{
              not cerb_record_writeable('ticket', id) 
              or status in ['closed','deleted']
            }}
          label: Close
          icon: circle-ok
          keyboard: C
          inputs:
            ticket@raw: {{id}}
            confirm@bool: yes
            status: closed
        interaction/delete:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.status
          hidden@raw,bool:
            {{
              not cerb_record_writeable('ticket', id) 
              or 'deleted' == status 
              or not cerb_has_priv('contexts.cerberusweb.contexts.ticket.delete')
            }}
          label: Delete
          icon: circle-remove
          keyboard: X
          inputs:
            ticket@raw: {{id}}
            confirm@bool: yes
            status: deleted

extension_params.data_query:
type:worklist.records
of:ticket
expand:[owner_]
query:(
  id:{{record_id}}
  limit:1
  sort:[id]
)
format:dictionaries
extension_params.sheet_kata:
layout:
  style: fieldsets
  headings@bool: no
  paging@bool: no
  title_column: image
  colors:
    labels@csv: #646464
    labels_dark@csv: #cccccc

columns:
  icon/image:
    params:
      record_uri@raw: cerb:worker:{{owner_id}}
      text_size: 400%
      text_color: labels

  card/owner__label:
    params:
      image@bool: no
      underline@bool: no
      bold@bool: yes
      text_size: 200%
      text_color: labels
      label_template@raw: {{owner__label|default('(nobody)')}}
  
  text/owner_title:
    params:
      text_color: labels
      
  toolbar/actions:
    params:
      kata:
        interaction/assign:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.assign
          hidden@raw,bool: {{not cerb_record_writeable('ticket',id) or owner_id}}
          label@raw: Assign
          icon: tag
          inputs:
            ticket: {{id}}
        interaction/take:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.assign
          hidden@raw,bool: {{not cerb_record_writeable('ticket',id) or owner_id}}
          label@raw: Take
          icon: user
          keyboard: Shift+T
          inputs:
            ticket: {{id}}
            worker: {{cerb_current_worker().id}}
        interaction/unassign:
          uri: cerb:automation:cerb.ticket.assign
          hidden@raw,bool: {{not cerb_record_writeable('ticket',id) or not owner_id}}
          label@raw: Unassign
          icon: remove
          keyboard: Shift+U
          inputs:
            ticket: {{id}}
            unassign: yes

query: on.ticket:(id:{{record_id}}) OR on.message:(ticket.id:{{record_id}}) OR on.comment:(on.ticket:(id:{{record_id}}) OR on.message:(ticket.id:{{record_id}}))
